pageTitle: Overlapping Travelcard or Bus & Tram Pass
description: Find out if and how you can get a refund if you have more than one Travelcard or Bus & Tram Pass and the dates overlap.

breadcrumbs.title: Overlapping Travelcard or Bus & Tram Pass

title.title: Overlapping Travelcard or Bus & Tram Pass

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can get a refund if you have two Travelcards or Bus \u0026 Tram Passes on an Oyster card or photocard and the dates overlap."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
You will need to give us your:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Oyster card number","Bank details (sort code and account number)"]}
We do not refund for overlapping days more than twice within 12 months.
